item.title: Linear Regression with Multiple Variables
item.description: I will recode assignments from 2nd week quiz regarding linear regression topic. Solutions are valid for one and multiple variables regression.

item.title: Motivation
item.description: I want to post on this blog series of short notes, about how to recode to Python assignments code from “Machine Learning” course. In original course language Matlab is chosen as teaching language. I wanted to have also Python version.
